com.cubeia.firebase.api.game.rule
Interface SeatingRules

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultSeatingRules
public interface SeatingRules

Interface for defining seating rules.

Method Summary
 boolean actionAllowed(JoinRequestAction action, Table table)
          Called to check if a player is allowed to join (sit down at) a table.
 boolean actionAllowed(LeaveAction action, Table table)
          Called to check if a player is allowed to leave (his seat a) a table.
 boolean actionAllowed(RemovePlayerAction action, Table table)
           
 boolean actionAllowed(ReserveSeatRequestAction action, Table table)
          Called to check if a player is allowed to reserve a seat (sit down at) a table.
 boolean actionAllowed(WatchAction action, Table table)
          Called to check if a player is allowed to watch a table.
